# Allow all search engines to crawl

User-agent: Googlebot
Allow: /

Allow: /
Crawl-delay: 0

Allow: /

Allow: /

User-agent: Baiduspider
Allow: /

User-agent: Yandex
Allow: /

Allow: /

Allow: /

Allow: /

User-agent: *
Allow: /
Disallow: /auth

Disallow: /dashboard
